Posts.Content: Skipper, I'm so sorry about Kathy.She has had a rough battle and wish she just could've made it till Christmas. Now she's one of the angels who'll be looking down on you. Please remember all the happy times with her. Hope you can relax now that you know she's at peace. God Bless you & her family. "Carole"
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today
